review: I love this thing! it auto powers (and switches input is necessary)on my tv when i hit the HOME key. The Apps Work great, and it has no speed issues that i can tell.my only 2 complaints are:no universal search. I understand Amazon wants to push their PRIME service, but i got used to it on my mothers ROKU, and miss it very much.It really should come with the voice remote. I have a android phone, and the Fire TV app is great, but it really shouldn't need to be a extra.
